website_summaries.verdict: Above average sound quality and 12 hrs. of battery life even at high volume. Reliable unit recharges quickly.
pros: 12W for sound loud enough for small gatherings
Battery recharges from empty in 3 hours
compatible with all common Bluetooth devices
Touch keypad is simple to use
cons: Slightly larger than other models, so a little less portable

customer_reviews.title: TURN UP THE VOLUME.....on your phone :)
customer_reviews.text: I just received this last night so I can only make an initial review. Ita adorable and THE MAIN REASON I am make such a hasty review....I recall many of the reviews I read stating that your device did not affect the volume so I was really disappointed in the output of this speaker.... UNTIL I decided to turn up the volume on my iphone 6. WHOAAAA! Amazing sound. I was able to wander around 40 feet before loosing bluetooth coverage. So far I am very pleased. If there are issues down the road I will update but just wanted to inform reviewers about the volume info
customer_reviews.author: bev

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful speaker! First off, the packaging it comes with is very nice and it comes with a micro USB charging cable, an AUX cord, and a waterproof protective sleeve for the speaker! As for the sound quality, beyond superb. The built-in sub-woofer gives amazing bass for how much and how big the speaker is. The battery life is very long and it doesn't take too long to charge. Another thing I really like about this speaker is the fact that the volume control is touch-controlled rather than just buttons. Overall, amazing bluetooth speaker for the price and if anyone is reading this right now, BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great! Speakers affordable
customer_reviews.text: I'll update in a few weeks! But my initial reaction is WOW. For the price the sound is great. The base is not bad either. I can feel it on the floor from where i was standing. Only "con" when you reach max volume the music pauses for like 2-3 seconds, meanwhile the speakers will play a tune, to let you know max volume. Why cant the tune play over the music?
customer_reviews.author: Frugal.Momma.of2

customer_reviews.title: Sounds clarity is good.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds crisp & good, new trend designed, looks attractive at any location, bass is ok but depend type of music listen to. can play the next mp3 song from my cellphone galaxy note 4 by touching the button on top of the speaker, cool, very convenience feature, battery life as advertised. Price range is about right. Nothing to complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazone customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value well worth the praise given.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to connect with my Amazon Dot. I wanted a nice sounding bluetooth speaker that doesn't break the bank and would have decent sound. Purchasing this was a great choice and I would highly suggest purchasing this product if you are in the market for a great sounding portable speaker. The addition of using a micro sd card to play music is nice. However, this unit really shines with the touch controls. Reminds me of the classic iPod with volume, mode, and skipping tracks. It's very smooth and intuitive to touch. Sound wise you will be amazed at that sound coming from a speaker that is less than $100.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: The quality of his speaker I just amazing and it's portable and runs off its own battery once charged. Was hesitant at first with this being completely touch screen and no buttons but it's extremely sensitive to the touch and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Look no further ... this is the one
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on this speaker based on the reviews and product features. I already have a Bose Soundlink Color, but needed an additional speaker for my office. Oh My Goodness !! This DOSS speaker sounds equal, if not superior to my Bose (and I am a diehard Bose customer). The sound and features are far more high-end than the price tag. Your search is over ... buy this DOSS Soundbox !!
customer_reviews.author: EyeLoveGlassesTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and playing songs in less than 5 minutes out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today and I gave it 5 stars because I literally had it on and playing in 5 minutes...(maybe even less time) and sound is great! I'm the least tech savvy person I know so I'm highly impressed. Took very little effort and now I have real sound not just piddly mobile phone sound for my favorite tunes! The waterproof bag is awesome and the cute card inside is a nice touch. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality and long lasting battery time
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality and long lasting battery time. I would definitely recommend it to other people. The only thing I can think of it's weight-slightly heavy...
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Before you buy this
customer_reviews.text: I bought to use it with my desktop PC and I am very disappointed because it keeps shutting off itself every 15 minutes to save its battery. One of the worst features I have ever seen. After it shuts off, it needs to be paired again. after it pairs, the volume automatically goes to 100% - very annoying. Because of this shutting off problem, I have to keep it in AUX mode and the sound quality is very bad in AUX mode.
customer_reviews.author: SmartCom

customer_reviews.title: Great sound from a stylish little device.
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as I thought, but Great sound:I could tell you that for sure.
customer_reviews.author: ucee

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead hit and hit "add to cart"
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I first saw this speaker. I knew I wanted a Bluetooth speaker and I knew I wasn't trying to go broke by purchasing one. This one seemed interesting but I was unsure because I need something that can get fairly loud, has perfect sounding quality, a clean looking speaker, fairly durable, and good base. Finally I decided I wanted this speaker.. Turns out I was wrong. I didn't "want" this speaker. I "needed" this speaker. All those years of living without this speaker in my life were a waste. You want this speaker in your life. So go ahead and hit that add to cart button and you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: M.J1221

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bluetooth Soundbox ! !
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the coolest addition to my home electronics. I don't know how something so small puts out great sounds!!! I have it for my Dot. It works so well I ordered a second one for the great room and for when I am working outside. The charge lasts a long time and a voice comes on to tell when it needs to be charged. I've become proficient when it comes to volume control. I love that finger tip control of the top. A lot of boom for a terrific price. Excellent customer service. Great price and arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: P. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Two units stopped working after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and both of them stopped working after only a few weeks. The speaker wouldn't turn off and wouldn't connect. It constantly made connect/disconnect noises and because we couldn't turn it off, it drove us crazy and we had to hide it in the garage until the battery died. There was instruction in the manual that if it won't turn off, to use the reset button, so this is apparently a known issue. Unfortunately it didn't fix the issue. These are absolute junk and would never recommend them. If it had only been one unit, I would have thought it was a fluke, but it happened with two units.
customer_reviews.author: J. Leaf

customer_reviews.title: Losses Bluetooth Connection
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have listened to all the other negative reviews and bought something better, even if it would be more expensive. It worked great for about two months and now it won’t keep Bluetooth connected. It’s really frustrating having to reconnect it all the time. It didn’t come with a cord to manually connect my device. The sound quality is great, I just wish it was usable.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: A Great speaker!Sound is better than other similar speakers.Worth the money! And Also When I got the speaker on my hand,i feel like "is this speaker can hold my style?"I used the speaker with my favorite song for the first play.I felt like the song comes from nowhere which means this is not what i expected but its far beyond what i expected! Sensitive touch surface controller,and can be switched between 3 modes.What I surprised is "previous","next" on the surface can be used on every kind of player app. Falling love with my speaker.Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: Connectivity, firmware, and tech support are hit-and-miss (mostly miss)
customer_reviews.text: Speaker worked fine out of the box. But by default it powers off after a certain amount of time, even if plugged in. I found that annoying. But on the company's web site, there are firmware "upgrades" to change that behavior. Problem is these "upgrades" break Bluetooth connectivity with some devices (e.g., my Bluetooth transmitter). Tech support was pleasant but unhelpful. Still deciding whether or not to return for a refund. UPDATE: Made another attempt to troubleshoot with tech support. Change "unhelpful" above to "completely useless". Lowering to one star due to poor tech support.
customer_reviews.author: RJ 760

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet
customer_reviews.text: Yes I turned my phone all the way up and I even verified instructions on how to turn the speaker up because it kept beeping when it was at max volume. I can literally have a casual conversation over max volume without yelling at all. That's weak. I've had speakers less than half the size be louder. I would not recommend unless all you use it for is music in a small quiet room. Anything can drown this speaker out so easily. I'm fairly annoyed with the speaker and the reviewers at this point. At least the sound quality was good. I bought the bigger speaker 20W speaker hoping it'll actually be loud.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: FIXED FIXED FIXED AND LOVING IT!💚
customer_reviews.text: Yoooooo I thought this was the best thing I have ever purchased in my life. Bluetooth is the way of the future! But G damn!!!! It started making the most annoying sound every two minutes. Like a busy tone for a phone. Jesus Christ in Heaven someone help me. I emailed the manufacturer and so far no response. I’m literally about to chuck this thing in the TRASHHHHHHH.... EDIT!!!! Finally got in contact with the manufacturer and they helped me fix it. I was literally about to die. Wonderful speaker but that damn noise was driving me insane!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Talley

customer_reviews.title: Skips midway through EVERY song
customer_reviews.text: I cant listen to a single full song. Every time, a song starts, midway through, it skips to the next song. I can’t even use these speakers without getting angry about wanting to listen to at least 1 song, through until the end. Wrote this review previously... then randomly received a free one in the mail. The EXACT SAME THING happened to the new one. I can’t listen to any songs without it skipping midway through. I end up getting so frustrated I just disconnect it and and listen to the music just through my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Butin

customer_reviews.title: Won't Shut Off
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an event where there was no plugs but we needed some music at our booth. Well day one it worked great, was able to connect easily with bluetooth as well as the aux cable. NOW the speaker will not shut off, it keeps beeping like its connecting but its not connected to anything. It will not shut off, I did the long hold like the directions, and it still beeps. The lights on top act light there is a short in the system...I don't know but it seems as thought this unit is defective. As cheap as it is I should have figured there would be some sort of an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kimya Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working; have to manually turn on button before each use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these as they were a deal of the day and i wanted them in different rooms. One of them stopped working about 2 months later (after return period had passed). The other one is still working. One big complaint. You have to press the button on the back of the speaker BEFORE you connect it to Bluetooth. So...compared to my Bose speaker, which all you have to do is to connect it, this is a hassle. You can't just go into a room and click on your cell phone and hear music. You have to go to speaker and turn it on first.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Taylor

customer_reviews.title: It seems to be a great speaker but it skips all the songs I try ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm highly frustrated with this product. It seems to be a great speaker but it skips all the songs I try to play. I called Amazon for troubleshooting tips and was told that it was missing a firmware update. I was told to use a Micro SD card to download the firmware updates. I do not have a MicroSD card and will now have to go buy one or return the product. I feel it's very unprofessional to send out a product that does not have all the necessary updates. Extremely disappointed with his company.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could give it zero stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm for @ 2 months. Then like many others here is started turning itself off and on of no apparent reason. Chirping like a bird periodically whether on or off. Would never buy anything from this company again. One of the few thing I have ever bought anywhere that just very quickly simply and permanently stopped working. Email support was totally useless also.
customer_reviews.author: Solutions Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for go-anywhere music!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, rich bass and strong dynamic range from a small speaker. Setup was a breeze: just turn it on, in range of your Bluetooth device, and wait for the confirmation beep. Haven’t verified whether it’s waterproof: I’m not inclined to sit out in the rain, and I have other music options when I’m inside. I have, unfortunately, verified that it’s “drop-proof”! A clumsy move on my part, but better I dropped the $25 speaker, than the iPhone XR! Overall I’m quite happy with the purchase, and recommend this speaker to anyone, who wants an inexpensive, durable option, for music on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth Speaker for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a single negative thing to say about this speaker. I actually purchased this speaker three years ago, and it's still going strong - even the battery! The sound quality is phenomenal (including the bass), the bluetooth connectivity is smooth and the controls are so easy. The music never sounds tinny or too quiet. I often bring this speaker to picnics, walks to the park, and to my backyard, and I've had several people ask where I found it. They can't believe the price when they experience the quality! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: not great
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my massage business and first use was terrible. The Bluetooth hooked up easily but when on this mode it had a high pitched feedback sound with the music. So I plugged it in with the aux cable and it got worse along with static. Also when the clients phone would buzz, you could hear it respond with feedback. Super disappointed as it's a nice looking speaker and initially had very nice sound for the price. The music source I have it plugged into is an old phone on airplane mode and no access to internet so there should be no interference.
customer_reviews.author: jody t

customer_reviews.title: Worked well...until it didn’t.
customer_reviews.text: This speaker worked well for a while. Recently, the sound started skipping when paired with audible. I didn’t experience skipping when simply using the speaker on my phone or my headphones. Also, within the last couple of weeks, the speaker has started turning itself on multiple times per day and it will not remain off. The manual says to press the reset button but that does nothing. It’s annoying for everyone in my home and if it worked better with audible, I could probably overlook the fact that it keeps turning on. But I’m not happy with it’s performance, and I’ve had it only 10 months.
customer_reviews.author: Emily R. Harwood

customer_reviews.title: Even if you don’t, you do need this!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth every penny! This little speaker was the first speaker I bought because it was affordable and I was very broke. It has been one of the best purchases I’ve ever made and I still use this thing today after I don’t know how many years of having it. It has withstood getting dropped, being thrown by an ex, taken kayaking, it is sturdy af! Absolutely amazing product, but thinking about buying another one just to have an extra one ready to go wherever and whenever!
customer_reviews.author: Tripdawg

customer_reviews.title: Very bad speaker DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: As I started using this speaker I noticed I may have a defective device. every now and then the speakers make a weird popping noise. The voice clarity is atrocious you constantly hear vibrating inside the housing. Finally the touch volume doesn't sync up with your on screen volume even though it tries. This is a nice LOOKING speaker that works terrible. I really wanted to like this speaker. DONT BUY update-the seller is tough to deal with and is very rude asked if I would send a video of my problem. Dealt with Amazon for return they didn't waste my time.
customer_reviews.author: Faithnfamily

customer_reviews.title: This item would not sync
customer_reviews.text: It took forever to charge, then it would not sync. Not with any of my iPhone’s, not with my boyfriends Android, etc. Then it wouldn’t turn off!! It kept making the cutsey syncing sound for hours...I packed it up to return to Amazon & put it in my car so I wouldn’t have to hear it anymore. It was sturdy looking, small & attractive. But it was clearly not working. It annoyed me so badly that I didn’t want to give it another try.
customer_reviews.author: Doctam

customer_reviews.title: A Great Sound!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for $19.99 during the Prime deal of the day and wow! I have several portable Bluetooth speakers, and they do not come close to DOSS sound quality. This speaker is clear, and has adequate bass sound to delight your ears. The sound is rich and full. Range is also more than adequate the enjoy the music and songs of your choice. Even though it is portable, it is still somewhat heavy and better for stationary speaker for your desk. And that's where I placed it and connecting to the my Moto X4 via Bluetooth was quick and simple. Overall, this is a great Bluetooth speaker that is clear, powerful, and long lasting battery life. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Aletheia

customer_reviews.title: Unless YOU update it’s Firmware, it turns off every 15 minutes
customer_reviews.text: The darned thing turns itself off every 15 minutes! There are lots of complaints on the internet about this. This is way over the top trying to save energy! If it’s in use, it should NEVER turn itself off! Only if idle. After all, it does have a TWELVE HOUR battery in the first place! It’s really a pain to turn it back on every 15 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value, pretty good but not great sound
customer_reviews.text: For $27, this speaker offers great value. The quality of the speaker honestly surprised me - fit, finish, and feel suggest a much higher price point. The only weak point is the sound quality, which is good but not great. Music can sound a bit flat if you are looking for a solely auditory experience. However, for a speaker that you can take anywhere and casually listen to, it hits the mark. High points include: - bluetooth connectivity, which has been very robust for me - speaker phone functionality, which has had very good sound quality on both ends - good battery life - versatility with SD card and bluetooth
customer_reviews.author: FloridaDad

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Customer Service!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it while it was working. Just gave up the ghost at not quite 8 months. Update 5-16-17 Awesome customer service. Bumped up to 5 stars. The same day I posted that it quit after 8 months I received an email from DOSS apologizing for my problems. They stated that it was still under warranty (which I didn't even know I had) and they would send out a new replacement. 2 days later I receive my replacement and am very happy again. Great customer service DOSS! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: malada

customer_reviews.title: Zombie like connection behavior after a year of use.
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these speakers and one started to have a Bluetooth connection issue. Hijacking from one iPad to another, like to software couldn’t lock on a Bluetooth signal and stay. When it started searching and disconnecting at all hours, even when turned off, we have to remove it from the property. Even stashed in the trunk of vehicle, it would try to connect (the sound signals of connection search) until the battery died. The unit has been since disposed. We are cautiously monitoring the second unit for this zombie like behavior. Unfortunate since we liked the sound and used both often for home and travel.
customer_reviews.author: khd

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality was so horrible, that I would question as to how this device has gotten so many 5-star reviews. Increasing volume makes the sound even worse. I just couldn't listen to my favorite songs for more than a few minutes on this device - it made them sound absolutely horrible. If you don't mind the sound quality and need just a loud and cheap soundbox, this device might be for you, otherwise, keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: JvN

customer_reviews.title: Really good speakers, sound and battery life are great.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my macbook pro, which has awful built in speakers. It connects easily via bluetooth, but you can also use the provided cable to connect the speakers using earphone jack. The sound is amazingly good and I change it once every few days. Honestly I don't know what is the battery life of this since I have not used it till it was totally drained. One feature that saves the battery is that is auto shuts off when you are not using it. The controls are really nice, you have the volume control with a circular touch control and the forward and back automatically controls web apps like spotify. For the price, this is definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: HonestAbe

customer_reviews.title: Started out great...but now a waking disaster!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker was great for its intended purpose; bedroom music. However, I purchased in June, have seldom used, and today when charging, has cut off and on non stop for hours!!! I don’t understand what happened. I went to use it, plugged it in, and after about an hour it started rebooting itself and has never stopped! Awful at 12:15am when I’m trying to sleep - thus why I’m up writing this review. It’s not worth the money you spend. Nothing works to correct the issue. Called support they had no idea, referred to DOSS tech support but now closed OF COURSE! Getting up and taking it out of the house NOW!!!
customer_reviews.author: La Toya C. Wimbush

customer_reviews.title: Great sound... if you use the cable
customer_reviews.text: We bought this speaker to give a volume boost to our overly-quiet laptop. We set it up plugged in with the included 3.5mm cord and were floored by the depth of sound compared to our laptop speakers. Suddenly you could hear the whole orchestra! And they are as loud as we needed them to be. We were disappointed when we tried to use the Bluetooth connection, though. The speaker looses connection only one room over, and even when your phone and the speaker are in the same room, there are frequent playback gaps. We’ve given up in the Bluetooth and use it solely as a plugged in speaker. But for the price, we are mostly happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Clegs

customer_reviews.title: Great little  speaker with a  big sound.
customer_reviews.text: This my first Bluetooth speaker box.I was kinda skeptical about buying it at first. Being that it was kind of small. But to my amazement, this little monster had decent mid-range sound. Sorry, no subwoofer here for that deep bass. But anyway I like it. Battery life is great. You can even connect a 3.5 jack plug to behind your PC, If you don't want Bluetooth. But who in their right mind doesn't like Bluetooth today...lol The only thing I didn't like the speaker box didn't have any earphone jack plug. Anyway, it was a good buy for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Pretlow

customer_reviews.title: DON'T pair this with a Mac unless you like being annoyed
customer_reviews.text: There's a lot to like about this speaker. The sound is great. Features are fine. Volume control is a little inaccurate but fine. Size is great. HOWEVER, if you are connecting this to a Mac (running Catalina) you can forget a 3.5 jack connection. The speaker itself won't recognize it and the Mac think it's now a microphone. Bluetooth connectivity is great but if you get a phone call or simply need to pause the music for a second (or aren't playing any) PLEASE ENJOY WHILE THIS SPEAKER TURNS ITSELF OFF. That this feature can't (at least) be extended or better yet, shut off makes this a huge PITA with any desktop. You've been warned.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rome

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Bluetooth connection
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed about this. We have a pretty good sound system at home so this thing only comes out when we are traveling. Unfortunately, I have to keep this plugged into the wall in order for it to work because it doesn't hold a charge. It also takes about 10 minutes and repeatedly pressing the button to connect to Bluetooth, and that only happens when it wants to. Sounds okay outdoors, just that connectivity is a bit aggravating.
customer_reviews.author: gwen

customer_reviews.title: This product is a piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: I'ts been 6 months since i tried using this device, it was dead. I put the charger on for 8 hours and used it for about 1 hour. Tried using it the next day and it was dead. Put the charger on and it keep turning on. I would turn it off and within 2 minutes it would turn on. You can't turn the device off, it turns on by itself. DON'T BUY THIS PIECE OF CRAP! I THREW IT IN THE TRASH..................................
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 of these in the last year. The first one lasted just past Amazon return policy so maybe 5 weeks. The second one has lasted about a year. One year is absolutely unacceptable! Before I bought this speaker I had this tiny little speaker that lasted me years and cost less than $10 and even though it was tiny it was mighty and I sure wish I could buy that speaker again! With both speakers it was the same problem it stopped charging! It's a shame I love the pink color and I bought the pink case and now it's just garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S.

customer_reviews.title: Poor port quality --> can't recharge anymore, after 13 months' use
customer_reviews.text: This was a decent speaker for the price. Sound was somewhat better than the built-in speaker. However, after using for 13 months, the thing is toast (1 year warranty, I am assuming now). The speaker has been okay enough, with an annoying busy phone signal sound when low battery. Also, the signal cuts out unpredictably, sometimes, causing my computer to crash (this never happens with the on-board system). But the worst has been the port for recharging - the thing is damaged from repeated normal use. It will not take a charge, and I have no choice to throw it away, and choose a more durable brand for my pext speaker.
customer_reviews.author: amazeusmozart

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is sucks!
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews before buying it and they are all happy and satisfied with the product they have but except me I am so disappointed because the battery it will only last for like 30 mins and that’s it it shut off. What a waste of money. I thought I can use it for my daily exercise. I think this seller gave me a defective item. They should’ve check it before ship it. It’s hassle on my part to return. And I would be glad if they can replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Bruhilda

customer_reviews.title: All  in all speaker is nice
customer_reviews.text: first the review's satisfaction low rating is for the shipping. the speaker came in a somewhat larger box with no packaging at all. just the speaker in it's fitted box. it says in the pamphlet to not shake it and i can only imagine it's shipping journey. also not really sure the speaker is new and unused. ok - that said. it sounds good, has ample audio power...really boosts the weak audio of my laptop and gives it some "bottom" which is absent in the crummy sound card. the circle control took me minute to figure, nice once figured out. i'd buy it again but look for another seller on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quit working in less than 5 months.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in July used it probably 20 times or so sounds great for a cheap bluetooth speaker. I really liked it felt like good quality but today for no reason it turned on by itself and wont turn off or connect to anything. Upon further inspection (took it apart) the charging board has malfunctioned. The second I unplug it the speaker connected to my phone and started working again...but the power button is on the same board so it wont turn off. I had to cut the power wire at the battery to shut it off. So not so good on quality control. Not really happy with my purchase at this point.
customer_reviews.author: A25yearoldpie

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, for a short time
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product and was very pleased with its sound quality, so much so that I purchased another as a gift. Unfortunately, that speaker developed some kind of glitch after several weeks and stopped functioning, just continued beeping. I ordered a replacement since the first speaker still worked, thinking that it may have been defective. Unfortunately that unit stopped working after only a couple days. Customer service did not make good on their commitment to replace it. I have found another product as a replacement and would not purchase this product from this company again. UPDATE: Doss did get a replacement speaker shipped out. Unboxed it and it is working.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Design is nice. Compact. Easy to setup. The sound gets distorted quickly when turning up- not as loud as I would like but will probably fit the needs of most. Don't misunderstand- it is pretty loud- but with iPhone on max volume I can turn Alexa up about 75% but at around 80% it begins to get distorted sounding. I could try to lower volume on phone and turn volume up on Alexa to see if that has an effect but have not tried. It meets my needs
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Bland

customer_reviews.title: This thing plays crisp music...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something economical that works. So far this is it. I've had this little box for approximately two months. I only play this when I'm doing chores, etc. It beats any other sound system that I have in my home. I link this to the playlist on my phone, and I get a loud, crisp sound. The battery life is pretty strong. I've heard tales of a beep or disturbance that's heard when the battery is low. I never let the battery get too low. The only drawback I've experienced is my sound skips if my phone is too far away from this box. Therefore, I keep them near each other.
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: Go for It !
customer_reviews.text: I have another bluetooth speaker (Anker soundcore-(it's a very good speaker)), but this DOSS has better quality sound. It's bigger than Anker and heavier too. I think is a good option to have a micro-SD slot. About controls are very easy to use, and colors blue and white are terrific. This speaker has enought volume to "fill" a large room without sound distortion (compared with the Anker soundcore, it has a little more max volume). I am afraid about battery because I wonder is not as fantastic as Anker soundcore, maybe because his brilliant lights and his caracteristics sounds when connected and desconnected. Definitely I recommend this speaker because his price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rolan

customer_reviews.title: Nonexistent bass
customer_reviews.text: Bought this based on other reviews I read saying this speaker had pretty good bass.... It doesn't. In fact, it barely has any bass at all and is pretty treble-heavy. Tried several different equalizer apps too to see if I could tweak it but it still lacked a lot of bass. I thought I could replace a Bose Soundlink Mini with this, but it's truly no comparison - Bose wins by a landslide. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: WORST SPEAKER EVER!! DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great but has its issues. I've had this since may 2019 and it turns itself on out of nowhere and tries to connect to Bluetooth. When I try and turn it off by pushing the on/off button nothing happens. I've tried looking for answers on how to solve this problem but nothing. Wouldn't recommend at all! Don't buy this speaker!!! Nothing but problems in the end!!! If I could get a refund I totally would. Not worth it! 👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼
customer_reviews.author: Brendi H

customer_reviews.title: So many connectivity problems. Not worth the hassle. AVOID DOSS!
customer_reviews.text: I have so many connectivity issues with this piece of junk. It doesn't matter how well the physical device is designed when the Bluetooth driver is such garbage. One glitch is a telephone "busy" sound that sounds every 10 seconds while listening to music, etc. Also, these problems don't start right away, so in the beginning the speaker seems fine, but the glitches start creeping in the longer you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mellow Monk

customer_reviews.title: Decent Bluetooth Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I like this speaker overall. It has great sound quality, especially for its size. Just about every time I use it, I have to connect my iPhone manually. Also, the power button rarely turns the speaker off. I have to stick a paperclip or small screwdriver in the 3.5 jack to hit the reset button in order to power it off. I was going to send it back, but I just didn't want to hassle with that. If not for the power button and Bluetooth issues, I'd rate this speaker 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: LandK

customer_reviews.title: Used a few times-6 mos life...
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used the speaker much but when I did, it seemed to work OK. Don’t expect a lot of bass and as you turn up the volume, clarity weakens. Today, around 2 AM, I was awakened by the speaker randomly turning on. Now I can’t get it to turn off and it keeps repeating the melody. It’s going in the trash now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 speakers stopped charging
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased this speaker twice. The first one worked for about a year and then stopped charging. We purchased the second one thinking the charging issue was a fluke, and now the second one is doing the same thing after less than 6 months. We will not be purchasing it a third time. Other than that, it is a great speaker! Sound is great, and it is easily portable, but useless if we can’t get it to recharge.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but randomly turns off or disconnects
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I would have given this product five stars because of its good sound, but now that I've used it for over a year, I'm dropping it down. It randomly turns itself off even with a full charge and even though on for perhaps 15 minutes. Sometimes, it doesn't turn completely off, but it will randomly disconnect from my phone bluetooth. I can't be sure whether the bluetooth disconnection is the fault of the speaker or my phone, but it certainly cannot be the fault of my phone for the speaker to just turn off by itself. This is a frequent, ongoing problem. I cannot recommend this product anymore.
customer_reviews.author: letsw8

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing purchase
customer_reviews.text: I had this speaker for two months before it started going downhill. First, the sound quality issues developed with the plugin feature. A couple weeks later, the unit started shutting of after 15 minutes of use. I’m tired of constantly rebooting the unit. I would not recommend this product. I’m going to order a new set of speakers but will try a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: T. H.

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound for it's size.  Customer service is SUPERIOR.  Integrated micro SD Card is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Hey, it's a great little speaker to put in your garage or whatever, while streaming music via bluetooth on yoru phone. That's one of the things I use this for. I also put mp3s of lullabys on the sd card and let it play overnight for my young child. Don't expect chest thumping bass, you know, but if your cellphone has built in equalizer or tone controls, you can make this speaker sound pretty good. Also, I've made two inquiries to DOSS customer service. Both were responded to, via email, within hours. This is amazing to me in a world where manufacturers and brands don't seem to care after you've forked over your money to them.
customer_reviews.author: RReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for eight uses now sounds garbled
customer_reviews.text: I have used this speaker for less than a month. It stated of okay but now sounds garbled. I use it for my sons room for sleep music. It's a great looking speaker but doesn't meet my needs. It makes an annoying connection noise which is problematic when using in a nursery, the volume light emits a bit of light which might be great for some folks but I don't need any illumination in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Sabreen

customer_reviews.title: Doss Soundbox
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing 2 different bluetooth portable speakers and having each child take them to school, I bought myself the Doss Soundbox. Out of all 3 speakers, this is by far the best. Paired easily with my phone. I am very pleased with the sound quality and it is very compact and easy to take with me outdoors. I'm hiding this one from my kids!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fountainhead

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why all the glowing reviews....
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing special about this speaker. It not especially loud, nor does it have bass to speak of. When I put an SD card with music on it, the playback stutters badly. I was able to get it to sound half decent by running an EQ app, but that should not be necessary. I will be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: G. Maus

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love these....
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these for my wife due to the simplistic interface. It sounded great and had a sturdy feel. I fell in love with it and purchased 2 more. I setup one for her Chromebook, one for her windows 10 notebook, and one for a bedroom TV. All was well for a week or so then one of the 2 new units failed. It will not power or and stay on. Quite disappointing, my Logitech and zero chill units are still running strong and sound much better and have been doing so fo a year. So even if the interface is better on these units they seem to not hold up under delicate use.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Hagan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, louder than the other ones, battery life is great...  Love it connected to my Echo Dot, and for Travel
customer_reviews.text: ******UPDATE****** I must say, the customer service folks at DOSS exceeded my wildest expectations, and replaced the unit I had, they were proactive, and I am thoroughly impressed. The new unit, I have works perfectly! I have a few of these speakers, but this seems to work the best with bluetooth, but also is the loudest! I will update again in 60 days. **** During the 60 days that this speaker worked, it was pretty good, louder than the other ones in its class, and It was on sale when I bought it... Anyway 60 days later, it's a paper weight, will look up warranty, and update.
customer_reviews.author: Parister

customer_reviews.title: Not For Me
customer_reviews.text: Ok after reading all the glowing 5 star reviews I guess there has to be a bad one in there somewhere. And its me. I wanted this Bluetooth speaker to be as good as the reviews, but its not. Poor connectivity, Loses connection, Poor Bluetooth range. It did connect very easy but lost connection in about 5 minute of play time. As I moved around in my room it was very poor quality. Five feet from my PC it was horrible. But it does look cool, but just did not work for me. I really wanted to work great but it didn't. I know DCSS makes good products but IMO tis is not one. Im returning it.
customer_reviews.author: samg

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Got this speaker for my husband as part of his Father’s Day gifts. We have the echo dot but he loves listening music while he showers and I wanted to get him something where he could connect his own phone to it and listen his own music. We are pretty impressed by the overall quality. The sound is really good, the style of the speaker is very sleek and the “touch” feature is pretty nice too. He’s very happy with it and uses it everyday. I would totally recommend this product to someone looking for a nice speaker at a decent price point that doesn’t break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Abalos

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker, pairs in seconds to my PC and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker, pairs in seconds to my PC and iPhone. Battery life is even longer than advertised, I get 14 hours. Bluetooth connection is solid, when paired to PC I can take speaker to any place in my house and even out in the yard without any drop outs. The first one I received had a problem with the on/off switch, hard to use. I reported it to Doss and within 5 days had received a new speaker. That's what I call first class customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred G. Rillo

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Have this linked to my Echo dot in the kitchen via Bluetooth. Makes the Alexa voice louder and is very crisp and clear. Pairing to the Dot took a few minutes but did work first time. I keep it plugged into power all the time since it's in the kitchen. The lights remain on on the device which is mildly annoying. If there is a power cut the speaker does not power back on automatically despite being plugged in. It re-pairs with the Echo Dot automatically once you switch it back on. Wish I could configure it to power on automatically once power returns after an outage.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: skips on audio books while using bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend, because I had bought an earlier model of the same item, but it skips on audio books while using bluetooth. On music, this does not happen, so he is forced to plug his phone into it to listen to audio books. I looked up this issue on google and found that it is a common problem. Many people complained that their bluetooth speakers skip when playing audio books. It doesn't matter if they are streamed or downloaded. And, no one could come up with an answer. I considered returning it, but who knows if it would happen with another I might buy?
customer_reviews.author: truthy

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Connectivity?
customer_reviews.text: The speaker sound is not bad. However, this speaker barely was able to connect to anything: iPhone, iPad, MacBook, Samsung phones. If you were lucky to get connected, you had to wait around 2 minutes (not exaggerating) to be able to get any sound to come of this speaker. I tried to connect the computer directly to the speaker with the cable provided by DOSS, and same luck, no sound at all.
customer_reviews.author: RammsteinMotörhead

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Affordable Bluetooth!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for an affordable Bluetooth speaker that can put out some decent volume, this is a great buy. Surprisingly good sound quality, considering the size, particularly with the bass. No it's not a Bose, but it's also not absurdly expensive. This won't rock the house if you're trying to have a party volume-wise, but if you're looking to add background tunes to your backyard get-together, or similar event, this works great. I rarely need to recharge this guy either, battery life is great. Also never had issues with connecting my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Vieth

customer_reviews.title: Where’s da bass?
customer_reviews.text: I think they forgot to put the “enhanced bass” in my model. It’s not the worst speaker but I see why I need to still spend more. I also don’t care for the volume control. It’s nothing like my last Bluetooth speakers. I could turn the speaker up but it didn’t crank it up on my iPad or iPhone. I will give credit for the distortion free factor. Anyway, another lesson in “getting what you paid for” but I don’t think I’m keeping this one. It just bothers me too much. I miss the richness of other speakers. This is very limited. :(
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Paired easily with my phone, but I actually wanted this for my computer.
customer_reviews.text: I have some really noisy neighbors (toddlers) and I wanted to be able to beef up the sound from my computer so I'm not stuck wearing headphones during endless hours of classes via Zoom. Unfortunately this speaker does not want to connect with my Windows 10 machine, AT ALL - it sees it, it pairs with it, but it won't connect and play sound through it. Very frustrating. I've been fiddling with this off and on for a couple of hours and can't seem to make it work - i'm really tech-savvy, so this is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: dori

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a duplicate that I actually returned. The original Doss had been lost, but was found, so that is what I’m reviewing. I love this Bluetooth speaker. I synced it with my iPhone and played music every day when doing my water aerobic exercises. The music could be clearly heard, even in the water. I used it for about an hour a day and the battery would last a couple weeks with that usage. It’s now inside by my exercise bike for the winter.
customer_reviews.author: carolp

customer_reviews.title: Lots of interference when wired
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth works fine. I sometimes use this for my computer, but there is a ton of interference when using a wire. This results in pops and buzzing even if you mute the volume of the computer. It is not the cable because I can use the same cable for my headphones without issue. If you are using this for bluetooth, it's a great speaker. If you will use this with a 3.5mm audio cable, get something else. It's awful. It has been since I purchased it, but I still use it for bluetooth so never felt the need to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: RadGH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality and sound from a tiny speaker.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing little speaker. Hits the mark on treble and bass sound quality. Was taken by surprise at the talent this tiny speaker delivers. Has sound that over-matches larger units. When we entertain we always play music, and eventually friends ask “hey, where’s your sound coming from”? Well, surprise from this little speaker. DOSS knows a thing or two about speakers and quality. They easily compete with others in the market. We just ordered the DOSS Sound Box XL 32, so we can carry the same music we’re playing outside, to inside our home - you know incase it rains, we don’t want to break up our toast to a favorite artist.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Worked properly for a month
customer_reviews.text: This speaker sporadically will disconnect from bluetooth. Whether is was paired with my phone or paired with my computer. Other devices are paired with these two devices and never lose the connection. ONLY common denominator is the speaker. Out of the box was very simple setup, and ease of use. Easy to turn on an off etc. Currently this speaker will not turn off once it is fully charged. The speaker can't be found by any bluetooth devices when searching. Overall - very unhappy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie S. Mintzer

customer_reviews.title: Plays a dial tone every 30 seconds for the last 20% of battery life
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is great for the first 70% of battery. The sound is great, it's easy to connect to Bluetooth devices (and switch back and forth). If that was where the review ended, I'd give it 5 stars. ... At about 30% battery, the sound becomes very tinny. At 20%, the speaker becomes unusable. It "helpfully" tells you that it "only" has 20% battery left by playing a dial tone, pausing your music/audiobook/etc. Every. Thirty. Seconds. I can't remember how many hours this thing claims to play for on a charge, but whatever that is, discount that by twenty percent.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Good Bluetooth or Connect Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker to use mainly when we are outside but we use it inside also. It uses an ox cable so it does not connect physically to a newer iPhone because they don't have an ox cable. And we have had some BlueTooth issues with a newer iPhone but it may be operator error. I haven't had time to look into it yet. However for my older iPhone it works great. The sound is pretty good and goes loud enough for what we need. It stays charged for a quite a long time but then I try to keep everything pretty charged up.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Botts

customer_reviews.title: A great little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This packs a lot into a small box. If you need laptop speakers and don't want to spend a bunch of money, this is perfect. I love it because it allows me to listen to music at a nice volume even if I'm not right in front of the computer. Pretty good bass too. I'm a huge fan of Creative Labs so it took a lot for me to order something different. It's not as great as CL, but I'm still impressed, and a steal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: TJW

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I should have gotten the next verson up that has the dual sync, but this is do-able. The sound is pretty decent it is not Bose or one of higher end speakers but I like it for I am using it for. I am going to try to sync the 2 that I have using the Samsung 8 plus and update my post. 50 minutes later using the Samsung 8+....if you have the dual audio setting on your cellphone or tablet you can have both of these on at the same time. The sound was not bad ( guest bedroom was used) . It can/will try to play favorites but it does not sound too bad once balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmchie

customer_reviews.title: Big sound from small speaker
customer_reviews.text: Big deep sound from small speaker. A bit muddled. Very easy to connect and so far very good battery life. BUT... After just 6 months of use, the speaker keeps turning on by itself searching for a connection and it becomes very annoying specially at night when it keeps beeping. The button is not mechanical so even if it gets pushed, it will turn right back on...and off...and on and it's going to the dumpster!
customer_reviews.author: eop6

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: It won't replace a good set of 2 separate speakers for your sound. Single unit bluetooth sound boxes all suffer from the same muddy sound, from consolidating sound channels into one, and this is no different. Adjust your expectations accordingly. Also, I know a lot of folks who reviewed this were happy with the old iPod like touch controls, but when I move the box on my desk, half the time I forget they are there and I hit the controls- like moving it to the next track or cutting it altogether. I'm not super thrilled with that. So, 3/5 overall for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Collins

customer_reviews.title: Not having great results
customer_reviews.text: The DOSS replaced a previous model I had that stopped working. I love the sound quality of the device but found I cannot successfully use it with Bluetooth. I bought this due to the mandatory WFH policy of my company (CoronaVirus.) I am on global calls all day long. However, the phone via BlueTooth drops the sound within 5 minutes of the call. I have had better luck with the cable from phone to DOSS, but that started having issues as well. I was also getting crackling feedback this morning but disconnected the power cord between DOSS and Computer, and that fixed that. I have had this for about 1 week. Disappointed, to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Great little Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small Blue Tooth Speaker to provide music for a yoga class I have been teaching this summer. I purchased the Doss Touch Speaker after reading all of the positive ratings it had on Amazon and have been very impressed. It is a great size and very easy to operate. Out of the box and once charged, it immediately connected to my iPhone. The sound quality is excellent and it has great volume. I have been able to use it for up to four 1 hour classes on one charge. I'm pretty sure that it would go longer. This is a great portable speaker for the money. I am happy that I purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: Desert Dweller

customer_reviews.title: Get this
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this four stars now but may give it five after using it a while. Many reviewers say the volume isn't very loud but after turning up the volume on my cell phone the volume is really loud. The bass is much better than I expected. I am not sure if I like the soft touch controls. It is way too easy to change something by mistake. I also wish there was a voice telling you that it was paired instead of the tones. (I know that's a minor thing).
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Truesdale

customer_reviews.title: Sweeeet!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the DOSS after returning a poor-performingunit. The DOSS is a superior Bluetooth Speaker. 🔹Great Sound! 🔹Excellent Battery Life. 🔹Attractive Deign. 🔹Variety of Sound Source inputs. 🔹Simple Next-generation Touch Controls. 🔹Comes with Protective Travel Pouch. Okay. So there MUST be something about the DOSS I don't like. Right?? Well, yes there is. (If I really want to get picky.) It would have been nice if the LED charge status light (red when charging, green when done) were visible during charging; the plug of the charge cable is inserted above the LED, blocking it from view. My fix for that (see photo) was to stand the unit on end and—Tah-DAHHH!!—the LED becomes fully visible. 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: HTH

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker. Had it for almost a year if not longer. Only had one issue and for some reason it would he with my phone not my fiance. Sometimes while using the Google play app to listen to music the speaker would only play about 45 seconds of a song before skipping to the next. Idk how or why was it doing that but every time I've listen to music either in my car or with headphones it has never done that except when I use it with this speaker. To also be fair I dropped it once and little corner chipped but still works fine, just that sometimes it does that skipping thing with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good small cheap speaker
customer_reviews.text: I am a Zumba instructor who sometimes has to bring a portable speaker. I gambled on this based on price. It has made me very happy. It is very small. I fit it in one of those cloth decorative drawstring wine bags, along with all its cables (charging and connecting) since it didn’t come with a case. It works great in my gym bag. I connect with a cable, not Bluetooth, to an iPad, and quality sound is consistent. It produces more volume than my students desire. I charge it the night before each class for about an hour and it holds the charge nicely.
customer_reviews.author: kit

customer_reviews.title: Issues
customer_reviews.text: I have to give this a one, for one particular problem. I bought this to use it mainly as a - wired - speaker for an iphone. It will make random LOUD popping sounds if you just walk past it, because the connection ports are so flimsy. Into the garbage - this is the second one that I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Sean O'Hanlon

customer_reviews.title: Didn't die, just slowly faded away.  Now we can barely hear it.
customer_reviews.text: We were pretty happy when we bought this speaker. Actually we have two. The first was barely able to pair with anything, but we finally set it semi-permanently with my computer. My wife's SoundBox was manufactured a year later and it pairs normally. Lately both SoundBoxes have a problem with the maximum volume being relatively low. The sound is acceptible if the SoundBox is sitting on a desk next to the computer screen. But if we run a window fan, we can barely hear spoken words from the SoundBox, even if it is sitting on a coffee table that is pulled right up to the couch, i.e. close enough to eat a TV dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Tomato Times

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay sync'd with Alexa
customer_reviews.text: It has good sound, and was easy to set up, but it does not want to stay connected to Alexa. I also cannot get music to play on both my Echo Dot and this device at the same time - which is why I bought it. I should probably send it back, but I'm hoping I can at least use it this summer to play music through my phone outside.
customer_reviews.author: Public name

customer_reviews.title: Skipped a lot - sounded OK
customer_reviews.text: Sounded OK but mine skipped non-stop from the moment I brought it home. Skipped from one podcast to another podcast, from one song to another, LITERALLY non stop skipping. I called Amazon tech support and they suggested a few things to help the problem that I tried, nothing helped. I was SO bummed because I wanted to love it - it was pretty cute. But it was determined to skip through everything I tried listening to. Amazon was great about it from start to finish, absolutely nothing to complain about as far as customer service and technical support at Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy K

customer_reviews.title: Killer  Blue Tooth Sound
customer_reviews.text: I don't generally bother with reviews, unless a product is extremely good or really terrible. This Doss blue tooth speaker is simply fantastic. The sound is as crisp and precise as your high-end headphones. The tone is very musical. Base? Not much, of course, but adequate. Volume? It will chase you out of a medium sized room. When my wife heard it she thought I had purchased another high end stereo system. (When she saw the price she was relieved.) I am no techie, but this speaker could not be easier to set up, use and recharge. If I ever lose it, I will buy another one in a heartbeat. And no, I am not affiliated with the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Blair

customer_reviews.title: Update!  Manufacturer send me a replacement completely free of charge.  It works great!
customer_reviews.text: Although I generally liked this Bluetooth speaker, the on/off switch quit after six months. I can’t shut it off! I doubt I used it more than 24 hours in total. Unfortunately, the warranty return period is only 30 days so it turns out this Bluetooth speaker is a piece of junk! Rats! Beaten by Amazon! UPDATE! I was able to contact the manufacturer in California. They were polite and apologetic. They sent me a brand new speaker at no charge. Shipped free. The new speaker works fine and I enjoy it. This company stands behind their product!
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace similar item I bought last year [Meidong QQChocolate Bluetooth Speaker]. First impression is I'm going to like this a lot better. The other one in under a year started having an annoying problem with you push one button and get a different function, i.e. push vol up/down and get a track change. This unit appears to have MUCH better controls. First test sound quality was very good, no complaints. I'm giving it 5 stars on battery life and bluetooth as a guess until I actually find out. Overall better looking unit as well.
customer_reviews.author: John Street

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Let me put it this way, while watching a horror flick at night on my porch in the country, this speaker actually made me reach for my pistol. I'm amazed at how well the stereo is from such a small unit, it's almost like surround sound. Bass is excellent, volume is sufficient to make your neighbor either tell you that your taste in music is awful or "crank that *stuff* up!" Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ben and Becky

product_meta.title: DOSS SoundBox Touch Portable Wireless Bluetooth Speakers with 12W HD Sound and Bass, 20H Playtime, Handsfree, Speakers for Home, Outdoor, Travel-Black
feature_bullets: Capacitive Touch Control: Easy-to-use touch controls allow you to amplify the mood and energy of the party. Change tracks, volume and pair effortlessly with just a simple touch.
Portable and Versatile: Enjoy high definition stereo sound with impressive volume whether you're lounging, partying, camping, hiking or biking.
Bluetooth 4.0 Technology: Equipped with advanced technology and compatible with all Bluetooth devices. The speaker also remembers your last device, allowing you to reconnect effortlessly.
Superior Sound Quality: Enjoy your music in 12W full-bodied stereo realized through dual high-performance drivers and unique enhanced bass.

Extended Playtime: Built-in Li-Ion rechargeable battery powers up to 20 hours playtime at 50% volume. Recharge in 3-4 hours with the included micro USB cable. Reminder: This product is designed, manufactured and exclusively sold by DOSS.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars30,092 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Best Sellers Rank: #5 in Portable Bluetooth Speakers#79 in MP3 & MP4 Player Accessories
